overview: The Azure Local Hybrid Architecture integrates traditional and cloud-native applications, emphasizing a hybrid approach with Azure services and on-premises resources. This architecture is designed to ensure secure data management, efficient application deployment, and robust disaster recovery mechanisms.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Manages Azure services and resources through various tools.
security_considerations: Access controls must be enforced to limit management capabilities.
Regular audits of access logs to detect unauthorized access.
vulnerabilities: Potential misconfiguration leading to unauthorized access

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Hosts traditional applications and virtual machines managed through Hyper-V.
security_considerations: Ensure Hyper-V is configured with secure boot and shielded VMs.
Regular patching of the underlying OS and Hyper-V.
components.data_handling: Processes application data and VM configurations.
vulnerabilities: Hyper-V vulnerabilities, if not patched regularly

components.name: Kubernetes-based Applications
components.description: Supports containerized applications using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
security_considerations: Implement network policies to restrict pod communication.
Use Azure Policy for compliance and security enforcement.
components.data_handling: Handles application data and container configurations.
vulnerabilities: Misconfigured RBAC leading to privilege escalation

components.name: Validated Hardware
components.description: Specifies hardware configurations for Azure Local, allowing for scalable deployments.
security_considerations: Ensure hardware is sourced from trusted vendors.
Regularly review hardware for compliance with security standards.
vulnerabilities: Hardware vulnerabilities if not properly vetted

components.name: Corporate Firewall
components.description: Facilitates network traffic management and security between components.
security_considerations: Regularly update firewall rules based on threat intelligence.
Implement intrusion detection and prevention systems.

trust_boundaries.name: On-Premises Network
vulnerabilities: Potential for lateral movement if compromised
recommendations: Implement network segmentation to isolate critical components.
Regularly review firewall rules and access controls.

trust_boundaries.name: Cloud Environment
vulnerabilities: Misconfigured access leading to data exposure
recommendations: Conduct regular audits of access permissions.
Implement Azure Policy for compliance checks.
